name: Fizik Aliante R3 Open Sadddle - Unisex
description: Fizik's Open saddles have a refined base, padding and a central cut-out that increases comfort while reducing surface contact. The Spine Concept System lets riders choose a saddle to match their range of flexibility. To suit powerful road riders, the Aliante R3 is designed for those who rotate their pelvis forward and sit in the pocket of the saddle with the sit bones on the back.K:ium rail is light, strong and provides a stiff connection between the shell and the seatpost.Carbon-injected nylon shell offers stiffness and power transfer.Open cut-out is designed to provide more comfort in the riding position.Comfort Core foam is covered with Microtex for durability.
